snippet.title: Campfire Cooking Trailer
snippet.description:
Campfire Cooking is a puzzle game about relaxing moments in nature, as you prepare meals over a warm fire. OUT NOW on iOS and PC!

App Store: http://apple.co/2gRwrji 
Steam:  http://bit.ly/2guxQ2l

Follow dev on twitter: https://twitter.com/laytonhawkes
Get the newsletter: http://www.laytonhawkes.com/newsletter

Discover the joy of cooking on a stick and test your problem-solving skills with some challenging campfire puzzles! My latest creation is guaranteed to make you feel clever, hungry and eager to book your next woodland escape.
